name: F1 Drift
description:
I made this simple little racing game as a starter for my dev. group "ArrowBlox Studios". Yes, there isn't to much to do and it is VERY basic but I have found it very addicting. There are a ton of bugs that I have spent at least 5 hours trying to fix and will probably never be fixed. Controls are WASD and up, down,left, and right. esc. and 1-6 control your race track. If AI cars start driving at weird angles just restart the level.

You'll probably need WinRar to extract the file.

Sorry for having to pay 10 cents for a prototype that may never be fully developed but we are already developing more games!

*Sorry but this project has been cancelled!
